name: space-exploration-pipe-qol
title: Space Exploration pipe quality of life improvements
author: Feidan
description:
Quality of life improvements for working with space pipes;
* Mining the elongated pipe segments gives back the appropriate amount of space pipes instead
* Ghost versions of the elongated pipes are placed using multiple regular space pipes. Due to a limitation of the engine this will unfortunately break the pipette tool.
* Crafting underground pipes takes 0.5s
